levels.description: Stops attacking and immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP. Throws the banner to the location of ground enemies, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage and Stunning them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds. Enemies within the surrounding 8 tiles of the banner are inflicted with <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> and <@ba.vup>{debuff.damage_scale:0%}</> <$ba.fragile>Fragile</> effect. When the skill ends, retrieve the banner
